Disembodied Emil (SR).description: Greatly raise P.ATK for all surviving allies.

Disembodied Emil (L).description: Greatly raise P.ATK for all surviving allies.

Freeze Golem (SR).description: Greatly increases the effectiveness of allied Water skills.

Freeze Golem (L).description: Massively increases the effectiveness of allied Water skills.

Girl (SR).description: Increases P.ATK and M.ATK of surviving allies in the front row. If there is an ATK debuff effective, effect will be increased according to the reduction.

Girl (L).description: Greatly increases P.ATK and M.ATK of surviving allies in the front-row. If there is an ATK debuff effective, effect will be increased according to the reduction.

Gluttonous Eris (SR).description: Greatly reduces the SP cost of all skills for all allies.

Gluttonous Eris (L).description: Massively reduces the SP cost of all skills for all allies.

Hateful Bird (A).description: Greatly reduces ATK of all enemies in the vanguard, even if they have fainted. Applies to both P.ATK and M.ATK.

Hateful Golem (A).description: Greatly increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Hateful Hound (A).description: Greatly increases ATK of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.ATK and M.ATK.

Hateful Plant (A).description: Greatly reduces DEF of all enemies in the vanguard, even if they have fainted. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Karkinos (SR).description: Greatly increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Karkinos (L).description: Massively increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Library Wisp (SR).description: Greatly increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Library Wisp (L).description: Massively increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Lindwyrm (SR).description: Greatly increases the effectiveness of allied Wind skills.

Lindwyrm (L).description: Massively increases the effectiveness of allied Wind skills.

Noin, Sandstorm’s Mandate (SR).description: Greatly decreases the hit rate of all enemy Colosseum Support skills. *Effect ends early if two minutes or less remaining for Colosseum.

Noin, Sandstorm’s Mandate (L).description: Massively decreases the hit rate of all enemy Colosseum Support skills. *Effect ends early if two minutes or less remaining for Colosseum.

Simone (SR).description: Moderately reduce the SP cost of all allied skills.

Simone (L).description: Greatly reduce the SP cost of all allied skills.

Solitary Black Rabbit (S).description: Greatly increases ATK of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.ATK and M.ATK.

Solitary Black Rabbit (SR).description: Massively increases ATK of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.ATK and M.ATK.

Tricky Wisp (SR).description: Moderately increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Tricky Wisp (L).description: Greatly increases DEF of all surviving allies in the vanguard. Applies to both P.DEF and M.DEF.

Ugallu (SR).description: Greatly increases the effectiveness of allied Fire skills.

Ugallu (L).description: Massively increases the effectiveness of allied Fire skills.
